meanings.definition: A form of musical notation indicating fingering and positioning on a stringed instrument.
meanings.sent1: The guitarist followed the tablature to play the song correctly.
meanings.sent2: She learned to read tablature to play the guitar.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to read the tablature on the guitar but got confused.
meanings.sent4: The tablature was like a map guiding his fingers across the strings.
meanings.sent5: Memorizing the tablature helped him master the guitar piece.

meanings.definition: A system of notation for lute or guitar music.
meanings.sent1: The ancient lute music was written in tablature.
meanings.sent2: He preferred using tablature over traditional sheet music for guitar.
meanings.sent3: The tablature for the guitar looked like secret code to the beginner.
meanings.sent4: In his hands, the tablature transformed into beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent5: The intricate tablature revealed the complexity of the music.
